meanings.definition: Convert (data or information) into digital form.
meanings.sent1: I am digitalizing my old photos to save them on my computer.
meanings.sent2: The company is digitalizing their paper records to make them easier to access.
meanings.sent3: Digitalizing my recipe book will make it easier to find my favorite dishes.
meanings.sent4: She is digitalizing her thoughts into a blog for everyone to read.
meanings.sent5: The process of digitalizing the documents was time-consuming but worth it in the end.

meanings.sent1: We are digitalizing our inventory system to streamline operations.
meanings.sent2: The school is digitalizing their library catalog for easier search.
meanings.sent3: Digitalizing the board game made it more convenient to play with friends.
meanings.sent4: He is digitalizing his music collection for easy access on his devices.
meanings.sent5: The artist is digitalizing their artwork to share it online with a wider audience.

meanings.definition: To transform (analog data) into digital form.
meanings.sent1: The technician is digitalizing the old VHS tapes into digital files.
meanings.sent2: Digitalizing the vinyl records preserved the music for future generations.
meanings.sent3: Digitalizing the handwritten letters brought a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent4: She is digitalizing the family videos to create a digital archive.
meanings.sent5: The process of digitalizing the historical documents required careful handling.
